ygData.subject: Re: SK only items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My new Dark Reaver is pretty good for an SK.  Got if off a lucky trade (GZ and Rubi bracer for it).  Can t wait for it to proc the siphon strength. Umbral
ygData.messageBody:
rich.hitz@... wrote:
>
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> Is there a list of SK only items out there? Or one that
> shows what is best for an SK vs. what is worst?
> Thanks.
>

My new Dark Reaver is pretty good for an SK. Got if off a lucky
trade (GZ and Rubi bracer for it). Can't wait for it to proc
the siphon strength.

Umbral armor (Plane of Fear) is SK only, as is the Soul Leech.
Several weapons on EQ'Lizer are listed as SK/Warrior only.

The main SK problem is 1H vs 2H. My advice: work on both.
Don't get stuck at 27th like me and have pitiful 1H and bash.
Of course for a large race you can slam with a 2H weapon, so
I would probably stick to your 2H, but no reason not to keep
both maxed (except maybe intelligence =) since you can afford
a magic 1H before a magic 2H.

Now I have to borrow a claw from a friend, find a shield, and
get my skills up, hopefully without getting my nukers killed.
The best reason to keep 1H up for humans/DE's is so you can
bash a caster, and when they are using greater heal, that one
bash can mean alot.

Xilith
